std.value: It was a Sunday morning. Xiao Ming went to the museum with his parents. When Xiao Ming was appreciating the things in the museum, he suddenly found that some words were written on the wall. It was saying that somebody had visited the place. Xiao Ming thought it was wrong to write on the wall of the museum and it looked awful. Then he started to erase it. His parents saw what he did and praised him. They were very proud of Xiao Ming.

His parents saw what he did and praised him. They were very proud of Xiao Ming.

std.value: It was a Sunday morning. Xiao Ming visited the museum with his parents. While he was admiring the exhibits, he noticed some words scrawled on the wall, indicating that someone had been there before. Disapproving of the graffiti and finding it unsightly, Xiao Ming decided to clean it off. His parents observed his actions and commended him for his efforts, feeling a great sense of pride in their son.
